import axios from"axios";export default{// get all users
getUsers:function getUsers(){return axios.get("/api/users");},// gets users with given id
getUser:function getUser(id){return axios.get("/api/users/"+id);},// delete user
deleteUser:function deleteUser(id){return axios.delete("/api/users/"+id);},// add user
saveUser:function saveUser(userData){console.log(userData);return axios.post("/api/users",userData);},// get all workplaces 
getWorkplaces:function getWorkplaces(){return axios.get("/api/workplaces");},// add workplace
createWorkplace:function createWorkplace(workplaceData){return axios.post("/api/workplaces",workplaceData);},// get all comments
getComments:function getComments(){return axios.get("/api/posts");},createComment:function createComment(postData){return axios.post("/api/posts",postData);}};
